title: Frontend Development
description: Building responsive, accessible, and high-performance user interfaces using React.js, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and modern JavaScript.

title: Backend Development
description: Developing secure and efficient server-side applications with Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB, including REST API integration.

title: Responsive & Cross-Browser Design
description: Ensuring seamless performance and design consistency across all devices and major browsers.

title: Performance Optimization
description: Improving website load times, SEO readiness, and overall user experience using best development practices.

title: Full Stack Web Applications
description: Designing and developing complete web solutions from concept to deployment with scalable architecture.

title: UI/UX Implementation
description: Translating Figma or design mockups into pixel-perfect, interactive, and user-friendly interfaces.
